Pre-Game Insights: India have not had the best of times in the series thus far.
Rohit Sharma scored 64 runs in a massive 97-run opening stand with Shubman Gill.
Vandersay was the pick of the bowlers for Sri Lanka after he picked up six wickets.
Miscellaneous Highlights: There will be a chance of rain on Wednesday from 2 PM onwards.
Temperatures will be around the 30-degree Celsius mark.
Teams should opt to field first after winning the toss.
Others: India are still looking for their 100th ODI won against the Islanders.
